result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. ADAM J WASHINGTON

records.addlTxt: Warrant sent down to GLSO on 06/08/2022.
Per Agent Scott Guthrie, the defendant is in the Milwaukee County Jail on a violation of probation.

10:59 AM Defendant ADAM J WASHINGTON not in court.  Attorney Matthew McElrioy in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michael J Kapelis in court for ADAM J WASHINGTON. Atty Kapelis states he has no idea where the defendant is. Court orders a warrant - forthwith.

Court adjourned at 10:59 AM
Warrant cancelled - Spoke to Adam in dispatch.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver on May 31, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Warrant cancelled - Spoke to Adam in dispatch.

10:15 AM Defendant ADAM J WASHINGTON in court.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michael J Kapelis in court for ADAM J WASHINGTON.  Court quashes both warrants. Statement by DA Laspisa. Atty confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. DA makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500 signature bond and conditions of: Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set for Status of Prelim for May 31, 2022 at 10:30 AM. Mandatory in person appearance.

Court adjourned at 10:17 AM.

Def called in reference to his active warrants on both his cases with GLC. Def stated he got released from custody, was trying to get his life together, and forgot about his court appearance. Def's address and phone number were updated and def opted to receive text message reminders of upcoming court dates. Def was given a new court date of May 3, 2022 at 10:00 AM. Def was told to contact his attorney for 20CF60 and was told he would need to reapply for the public defender's office for his new case.

ADDRESS INFO for ADAM J WASHINGTON
Current: 3778 S 84th St Apt 3, Milwaukee, WI 53228 United States  (Effective: 04-27-2022)
Prior: 8885 South 68th St, C/O Milwaukee County House of, Franklin, WI 53132
DA's office to issue a new warrant for signature - talked with Adam, this warrant has been canceled.

Adam in Dispatch called questioning the warrant, if it was nationwide or adjourning counties. Informed him that this was a DA office generated warrant and he needed to contact the DA's office. DA's office will be issuing an amended warrant. The original warrant has been canceled.
